summary: U.N.C.L.E. agents Solo and Kuryakin try to stop a megalomaniac who thinks he's like Alexander The Great, commits offenses against the ten commandments and steals chemical weapons from the army in order to achieve world domination.
cast: Robert Vaughn|David McCallum|Rip Torn|Dorothy Provine|Leo G. Carroll|Yvonne Craig|David Opatoshu|David Sheiner|Donna Michelle|Leon Lontoc|Robert Karnes|Clarke Gordon|James Hong|Cal Bolder|Carol Williams|Teru Shimada|Arthur Wong
keywords: espionage|1960s|reference to alexander the great|psychotronic film|camp
title: Un espía de más
